content: this pattern combines a modified version of the timeless favourite granny stitch with pops of bright 2dc cluster stitches for a summery fiesta feeling mug rug perfect for brightening up indoor and outdoor dining or parties **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner **recommended yarn** aran/worsted #4 weight cotton or cotton blend yarn in 3 colours total amount used approx 0 65oz/18g 10 3yds/9 5m **hooks & other materials** us size h 5 0mm yarn needle stitch marker scissors **sizes/finished measurements ** approx 6 x 5 15 3cm x 12 7cm the pattern has been tested for errors by crocheters with varying skill experience but should you have any difficulties please contact me for help **are you on my email list ** i offer exclusive discounts on new pattern releases for my email subscribers and you ll always hear of any offers and events i m taking part in if you would like to join just click below join email list 1 **note on selling items and copyright** the pattern and all images are copyright janferie mackintosh all rights reserved please do not copy or share any part of the pattern please do not alter it and try to claim it as your own pattern you may not use my photographs without permission you may not make tutorial videos from my patterns you may sell finished items handmade in small quantities by you design credit is appreciated thank you **please note that instant download pdfs files cannot be refunded ** 1 https //thecraftytherapist com/subscribe/
